ExternalData.Titlesect: United Nations Convention on Transparency in Treaty-based Investor-State Arbitration

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 18 October 2017, in accordance with article 9(1) which reads as follows: This Convention shall enter into force six months after the date of deposit of the third instrument of ratification, acceptance, approval or accession .

TreatyNote.Text: The above Convention was adopted on10 December 2014 by resolution 69/116 during the sixty-ninth session of the General Assembly of the United Nations. In accordance with its article 7, the Convention shall be open for signature in Port Louis, Mauritius, on 17 March 2015, and thereafter at United Nations Headquarters in New York by any State or by any regional economic integration organization that is constituted by States and is a contracting party to an investment treaty.
